name: Designbook
tag_list: interior-design, decor, architecture, furniture, lighting, decor-accessories, siliconcape
overview:
South African home design portal - browse 1000s of home design project photos and products to get inspiration for your next project. Connect with suppliers and professionals and get it done perfectly.

Most of us seek out photographs of interiors to help us create our dream living spaces at home. This usually means flipping through magazines or searching Google to get ideas for your remodelling or furnishing project. Paul Ten-Bokum, founder of Designbook.co.za, spent many hours doing that for his own remodelling project and he decided there must be a better way.

Designbook.co.za provides tens of thousands of professionally photographed interiors and exteriors of beautiful South African homes all in one place, categorised and keyword tagged to make it easy for interior design and decor enthusiasts to get ideas for their next project. The site allows you to create “designbooks”, work spaces for collecting photos and product ideas all in one place for you to communicate with your partner or your interior pro.

Designbook.co.za features facebook-like photo tagging technology that links the items in the photos to a product catalogue, allowing you to source the products and services to bring your design to life.
